title: Ketu Transit in the 2nd House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting the 2nd house for Taurus Ascendant brings detachment from material security, speech, and established value systems. Interest in wealth accumulation weakens, while minimalism and non-attachment grow stronger. Financial flow may feel irregular, not due to loss but due to disengagement from aggressive pursuit. Speech becomes restrained, factual, or withdrawn, sometimes creating distance in family interactions. When approached consciously, this transit refines values, purifies motives around money, and redirects focus toward inner worth rather than external possession.
closing: Ketu in the 2nd house loosens attachment to wealth and speech. Conscious grounding transforms detachment into refined values and inner security.
